Chris' new Seascape Models webpage

Welcome to my new webpage. I got tired of the limitations imposed by my old google sites page. I was looking for a new alternative, that would allow me to post my own html and css scripts and I stumbled across Jekyll for making pages hosted on Github (via Sean Anderson's excellent webpage.)

I hope you find the material on my webpage interesting and useful. I have divided posts into Research posts, that focus on short posts summarising my research, and Code posts that provide hints and tricks for programming and data analysis.

Next step: get listed on RBloggers.

Cheers, Chris

Christopher J. Brown 2015 Home @bluecology
